title: Ventas Management to Make Company Presentation at Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Global Real Estate Conference
content: CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) (“Ventas” or the “Company”) announced today that its management, including Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Debra A. Cafaro, will make a presentation and participate in a question and answer session at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch 2015 Global Real Estate Conference (the “BAML Conference”) on September 16th in New York. The session is scheduled for 12:30 p.m. Eastern Time. The session will be audio-webcast and may be accessed through the Company's website at www.ventasreit.com. Company written materials relating to the session will be available on the Company’s website starting at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time on September 16th. The webcast and any such written materials will be archived at www.ventasreit.com for a limited period following the event. Ventas, Inc., an S&P 500 company, is a leading real estate investment trust. Its diverse portfolio of nearly 1,300 assets in the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom consists of seniors housing communities, medical office buildings, skilled nursing facilities, hospitals and other properties. Through its Lillibridge subsidiary, Ventas provides management, leasing, marketing, facility development and advisory services to highly rated hospitals and health systems throughout the United States. More information about Ventas and Lillibridge can be found at www.ventasreit.com and www.lillibridge.com. View source version on businesswire.com
